data.name: Eutropia [BETA]
data.description:
Dark mode for dolphin-emu related websites.
This style is NOT finished yet and will be updated regularly. It's already pretty usable though.
supported:
 - dolphin-emu.org
 - forums.dolphin-emu.org
 - wiki.dolphin-emu.org
planned support:
 - dolphin-emulator.com
